Class AppDriver

java.lang.Object
appDomain.AppDriver
public class AppDriver extends Object
Application driver for sorting geometric shapes.

This application reads shape data from a file, sorts the shapes using various sorting algorithms, and displays the results. Command line arguments control which file to read, what property to compare (height/volume/area), and which sorting algorithm to use.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Team5

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static char
    compareType
    The type of comparison to use: 'h' for height, 'v' for volume, 'a' for area.
    private static String
    fileName
    The file path for the shapes data file.
    private static char
    sortingType
    The sorting algorithm to use: 'b' bubble, 's' selection, 'i' insertion, 'm' merge, 'q' quick, 'z' heap.

  • Field Details

    • fileName

      private static String fileName
      The file path for the shapes data file.

    • compareType

      private static char compareType
      The type of comparison to use: 'h' for height, 'v' for volume, 'a' for area.

    • sortingType

      private static char sortingType
      The sorting algorithm to use: 'b' bubble, 's' selection, 'i' insertion, 'm' merge, 'q' quick, 'z' heap.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppDriver

      public AppDriver()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point of the application. Parses command line arguments, reads shapes from file, sorts them, and displays the results with timing information.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments in format: -ffilename -t[h/v/a] -s[b/s/i/m/q/z]

    • parseArgs

      private static void parseArgs(String[] args)
      Parses command line arguments to extract file name, comparison type, and sorting type. Arguments are case-insensitive and order-independent. If no path is specified for the file, automatically prepends "res/".
      Parameters:
      args - Array of command line arguments

    • getComparator

      private static Comparator<AbstractShape> getComparator(char compareType)
      Returns the appropriate comparator based on the comparison type.
      Parameters:
      compareType - The type of comparison: 'v'/'V' for volume, 'a'/'A' for area, 'h'/'H' for height
      Returns:
      Comparator for comparing AbstractShape objects

    • displayShapes

      private static void displayShapes(AbstractShape[] shapes)
      Displays the sorted shapes to the console. Shows the first shape, every 1000th shape, and the last shape along with their comparison values.
      Parameters:
      shapes - Array of sorted AbstractShape objects

    • getValueToDisplay

      private static double getValueToDisplay(AbstractShape shape, char compareType)
      Helper method to extract the appropriate value from a shape based on comparison type.
      Parameters:
      shape - The AbstractShape to get the value from
      compareType - The type of value to retrieve: 'v'/'V' for volume, 'a'/'A' for area, or 'h'/'H' for height
      Returns:
      The numerical value for the specified property
